scripts.lambda:update: npm run pkg:zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ${STACK:-operator}-dump --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip
scripts.stack:update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name ${STACK:-operator} --template-body file://operator.template --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Version,ParameterValue=$(npm run -s v) ParameterKey=IntercomAccessToken,UsePreviousValue=True ParameterKey=BucketName,UsePreviousValue=True
